title: I See Naked / Vedo nudo 1969 (Italian Comedy) starring Nino Manfredi

sources.title: I See Naked / Vedo nudo 1969 (Italian Comedy) starring Nino Manfredi
sources.description:
Seven sketches with seven funny characters all played by great Nino Manfredi.  Including the title sketch “I See Naked” in which a fashion editor begins to see naked women everywhere he goes.

Original title: Vedo nudo (1969)


This film is available with Italian audio, and subtitled in many languages.

Director: Dino Risi
Writers: Ruggero Maccari, Fabio Carpi, Dino Risi
Stars: Nino Manfredi, Sylva Koscina, Véronique Vendell
Genres: Italian cinema, Comedy, Foreign Film


00:00 - Full Movie (with subtitles)
05:55 - An actress charms hospital staff with her beauty and kindness while offering help to an injured man.
12:29 - A comedic Italian film unfolds in a hospital, blending romance and quirky courtroom antics.
18:45 - Misunderstandings and chance encounters spark a hilarious court case over a bizarre incident.
26:46 - Secrets and misunderstandings complicate relationships as characters navigate unexpected meetings.
34:32 - An unexpected encounter in Rome leads to a shared meal and engaging conversation between Ercole and Carlo Alberto.
41:02 - A comedic dinner conversation delves into relationships, preferences, and family quirks.
49:06 - A man’s wild night out spirals into unexpected situations and humorous misunderstandings.
1:00:36 - Themes of deception and infidelity culminate in a dramatic manhunt for a captured murderer.
1:18:18 - Relationships and desires are explored during a rainy evening filled with misunderstandings.
1:29:34 - Hallucinations and intoxication lead to awkward encounters in this comedic Italian romp.
1:47:24 - A humorous exploration of perception and nudity unfolds in a clinic setting.
